content: वेदिका {@--1@} A sacrificial altar or ground. {@--2@} A raised seat; an elevated spot of ground (usually for sacred purposes); सप्तपर्णवेदिका <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 44.</ls> {@--3@} A seat in general. {@--4@} An altar, a heap, mound; मंदाकिनीसैकतवेदिकाभिः <ls>Ku. 1. 29</ls> ‘by making altars or heaps of sand &c’. {@--5@} A quadrangular open shed in the middle of a court-yard. {@--6@} An arbour, a bower.
